content: Yeah, I guess I forgot that you're a chatbot. Anyway, I remember that I signed up for the recreational volleyball league about 6 weeks ago. We've had a few games since then and our team, the "Net Ninjas", is currently 3-2 in the standings. I've been playing libero and it's been a challenge, but I'm getting better at reading the game. Do you have any general tips on how to improve my volleyball skills?
